title: Gaming consoles available for a discount in the UAE
text:
Xbox One: Dh999 
Benefits: The Xbox One has dropped by more than 50 per cent since June this year, when it was available for Dh2,088. According to pricena.ae, it is now available for just Dh999 from mikensmith.com. The online offer includes same-day delivery for orders placed before 7pm and a one-year warranty. Payment can be by cash on delivery or credit card. This console offers a great selection of titles to choose from. 
Beware: The number of gameplay sharing options is on the limited side. 

Nintendo Wii: Dh625 
Benefits: If you are into tennis or boxing games, the Nintendo Wii ticks all the boxes. It is also one of the cheaper options, at just Dh625 – a big drop from its Dh1,100 price tag back in January. The offer from crazydeals.com comes with a one-year manufacturer warranty, and payment can be made by cash or credit card. Delivery is within three days. The console is also small and easy to carry.
Beware: The number of games available is limited and the console cannot play DVDs or CDs.

Sony PlayStation 4: Dh1,199 
Benefits: First released in December 2013 for Dh1,799, Sony’s PS4 can now be bought for Dh1,199 – a 34 per cent drop, according to the comparison site pricena.ae. The offer from buyondubai.com includes free shipping and the option to pay by cash on delivery or in-store. The device can also work as a complete entertainment system, with its streaming features and Blu-ray player.
Beware: The console does not have backwards compatibility for disc-based PS3, PS2 or PS1 games.
